text.__SUMMARY__:
Millettia lacus-alberti is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Democratic Republic of the Congo and Uganda.
text.Sources: Makerere University Institute of Environment and Natural Resources (1998). "Millettia lacus-alberti". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T34854A9894294. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T34854A9894294.en. Retrieved 21 December 2017.
